fields.label: Purpose
fields.description: Ensures a safe and productive workplace by regulating alcohol and drug use and offering support for addiction.

fields.label: Scope
fields.description: Applies to all employees, contractors, and visitors during working hours or company-related activities.

fields.label: Substance Prohibition
options: No alcohol consumption or possession on site
No illegal drug use, possession, trade, or influence at work

fields.label: Signs of Influence
options: Bloodshot eyes, slurred speech, off-balance, odor
Employee removed from site without pay

fields.label: Disciplinary Actions
options: Actions aligned with company disciplinary procedures

fields.label: Employee Responsibilities
options: Comply with policy and report concerns

fields.label: Monitoring and Testing
options: Random or scheduled testing may occur if suspected
Positive results lead to disciplinary action

fields.label: Legal Compliance
fields.description: Aligned with labor laws, safety regulations, and industry standards.

fields.label: Policy Review
fields.description: Policy reviewed periodically to reflect legal changes and best practices.
